Question: Zhejiang Kanghao Fitness equipment Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Kanglaibao Sporting Goods Inc.

Product CES 2024

- Established in 1988, located in Taizhou City, Zhejiang Province
- Mainly sells fitness equipment, exported to 40+ countries
- Owns a factory with nearly 200 employees and over 80,000 square meters
- Factory equipped with Auto CAD, UG, Pro/E designing systems
- Professional engineers for new product development
- Strict quality control with ISO9001 certification
- Adheres to "quality first, customer first" business philosophy
- Sincerely welcomes clients and friends from all over the world
Summary_cn:
浙江康莱宝体育用品有限公司

CES 2024产品

- 成立于1988年，位于浙江省台州市
- 主要销售健身设备，出口到40多个国家
- 拥有一个拥有近200名员工和超过8万平方米的工厂
- 工厂配备了Auto CAD、UG、Pro/E设计系统
- 专业工程师负责新产品开发
- 严格的质量控制，获得ISO9001认证
- 坚持“质量第一，客户至上”的经营理念
- 真诚欢迎来自世界各地的客户和朋友
